DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine impact provide chest physiotherapy duration mechanical ventilation , intensive care length stay , intensive care hospital mortality mechanically ventilated patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Respiratory Physiotherapy Critically Ill Patients Ventilated More Than 48 Hours
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 year , admit ICU need mechanical ventilation longer 48 hour Patients ventilatory failure due neuromuscular dysfunction
